mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM sale s JOIN software sw ON s.sw_code = sw.sw_code JOIN client cl ON cl.clnt_code = s.clnt_code JOIN category cat ON sw.group_code = cat.group_code JOIN view_sale_detail sd ON s.sale_code = sd.sale_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sale(sale_code, clnt_code, sw_code, sale_amount, isdeposit, order_date, supply_price, sale_price, sale_isExist) VALUES (#{saleCode},#{client.clntCode},#{software.swCode},#{saleAmount}, #{isDeposit}, #{orderDate}, #{supplyPrice} , #{salePrice}, TRUE);
